metadata.title: CVE-2019-20631 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libgpac.a in GPAC before 0.8.0, as demonstratedby MP4Box. It contains an invalid pointer dereference in gf_list_count inutils/list.c that can cause a denial of service via a crafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
